summary: This document appears to be a financial record listing transactions and account information related to the 2013 Butterfly Trust and other entities, with references to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes dates, amounts, bank names, and account numbers, and notes that the information was derived from Grand Jury materials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in connection with the 2013 Butterfly Trust and JPMC accounts; the document's financial data is likely related to his activities.

persons.name: M. Arda Beskardes
persons.context: Listed as "Esq" in relation to an "H-18 Application" for Devine Corporation with USCIS, suggesting legal representation for an immigration or corporate matter.

events.title: Establishment of Butterfly Trust
events.description: The 2013 Butterfly Trust is referenced, with associated financial transactions and account details.

events.title: Transfer of Butterfly Trust assets
events.description: Assets from the 2013 Butterfly Trust were transferred to a JPMC account at National Financial Services LLC, a subsidiary of Fidelity Brokerage Services LLC.

events.title: Document compilation date
events.description: The document notes "As of 11/7/2019, by" indicating the date the information was compiled or reviewed.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document contains detailed financial transaction records, including dates, amounts, and bank account numbers, linked to the 2013 Butterfly Trust.
Jeffrey Epstein is directly named in connection with JPMC accounts and the Butterfly Trust.
A significant transfer of assets from the Butterfly Trust occurred on May 10, 2019, to a JPMC account at National Financial Services LLC (Fidelity).
The information is noted as being derived from Grand Jury materials, restricting its dissemination under Rule 6(e).
An attorney, M. Arda Beskardes, is mentioned in relation to an H-18 Application for Devine Corporation with USCIS, indicating a potential immigration or corporate legal matter.
